sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: --libexecdir=$GNOME_PREFIX/sbin : This switch puts libexec files in $GNOME_PREFIX/sbin instead of $GNOME_PREFIX/libexec.
--sysconfdir=/etc/gnome : This switch puts configuration files in /etc/gnome instead of $GNOME_PREFIX/etc.
--disable-gtk-doc : This switch will prevent the rebuilding of documentation during the make command.
